issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Around 29 files that should have apache license headers are missing it in 0.12 branch. There are some more such files in trunk.
This needs to be fixed for the 0.12 release.
NO PRECOMMIT TESTS
fields.summary: some files are missing apache license headers

comments.body:
List of files that should have AL header and are missing it -

hbase-handler/src/test/templates/TestHBaseNegativeCliDriver.vm
metastore/src/model/org/apache/hadoop/hive/metastore/model/MDelegationToken.java

Verified both patches using - ant clean package test -Dtestcase=nothing
Patch committed to trunk and 0.12 branch.
